comment.author: 26651465@N06
comment._content: Those are peasants (Fallaheen in Egyptian slang).  The term "Arabs" is use locally to designate bedouins dwelling desert areas and not practicing agriculture usually.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
The descriptions for this image were transcribed from the labels found on the actual lantern slide. They may not be accurate by current means, but reflect the times they were created in. We try to convey the original context with the images. Thanks for your comments. 

Angie, Brooklyn Museum Archivist
